TopicTitle: Yellowish atmosphere when launching Tantares craft

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I think this is a scatterer issue but I am not sure as I have a lot of mods installed. Whenever I try to launch a craft which consists of parts from the Tantares/Tantares LV mods the sky looks like evening even during the middle of the day. The ocean also is transparent until I rebuild it. You can find my mod list below.

 

Alcubierre Warp Drive (Stand-alone) (AlcubierreStandalone 0.10.0.0)
Almost Free Launch Clamps (AlmostFreeLaunchClamps 0.2.2)
BetterBurnTime (BetterBurnTime 1.6.1)
Bluedog Design Bureau (BluedogDB v1.4.2)
Civilian Population (CivilianPopulation 2.1.2)
ClickThrough Blocker (ClickThroughBlocker 0.1.6.7)
Community Resource Pack (CommunityResourcePack 0.10.0.0)
Destruction Effects (DestructionEffects 2:v1.8.0)
Distant Object Enhancement (DistantObject v1.9.1)
Distant Object Enhancement default config (DistantObject-default v1.9.1)
DMModuleScienceAnimateGeneric (DMagicScienceAnimate v0.20)
Elon's Roadster & Starman (ElonsRoadsterStarman 2.1.1)
Engine Lighting (EngineLighting 1.5.1)
Environmental Visual Enhancements (EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements 2:EVE-1.4.2-2)
FASA LaunchClampsContinued (FASALaunchClampsContinued 1.1.4)
Kerbal Reusability Expansion (SpaceXLegs 2.8.4)
Kerbalized SpaceX (Kerbalized-SpaceX 1.26)
Kopernicus Planetary System Modifier (Kopernicus 2:release-1.4.5-4)
LoadingScreenManager (LoadingScreenManager 1.2.5.1)
MechJeb and Engineer for all! (MechJebForAll 1.3.0.2)
ModularFlightIntegrator (ModularFlightIntegrator 1.2.5.0)
Near Future IVA Props (NearFutureProps 1:0.3.3)
Near Future Solar (NearFutureSolar 0.8.12)
Near Future Solar Core (NearFutureSolar-Core 0.8.12)
PlanetShine (PlanetShine 0.2.6.1)
PlanetShine - Default configuration (PlanetShine-Config-Default 0.2.6.1)
RasterPropMonitor (RasterPropMonitor 1:v0.30.5)
RasterPropMonitor Core (RasterPropMonitor-Core 1:v0.30.5)
Real Plume (RealPlume 2:v11.0.0)
Real Plume - Stock Configs (RealPlume-StockConfigs v1.2.0)
scatterer (Scatterer 2:v0.0329_for_1.4.2)
scatterer - default config (Scatterer-config 2:v0.0329_for_1.4.2)
scatterer - sunflare (Scatterer-sunflare 2:v0.0329_for_1.4.2)
SmokeScreen - Extended FX Plugin (SmokeScreen 2.8.0.0)
Stock Visual Enhancements (StockVisualEnhancements 3:1.3.0.4)
Stock Visual Enhancements-High Res Textures (SVE-HighResolution 3:1.0.7)
Stock Visual Terrain (SVE-Terrain 2.1.4)
Toolbar (Toolbar 1.7.17.11)
Toolbar Controller (ToolbarController 1:0.1.6.16)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Tantares                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              TantaresLV

 

Here you can what it looks like with scatterer disabled...                                                                                  And enabled.

Is pollution from glorious Soviet factories! Do not try to resist; embrace the addition of patriotic sulphur dioxide to the atmosphere!

 

*Ahem*

 

If you haven't already, I'd try eliminating mods to determine what is conflicting. It may be an issue with scatterer alone; I don't see why Tantares would be baking your game in such a weird way and there don't appear to be any other mods that would conflict.

 

Hope you get it fixed!
